backend/main.mo: Actor providing user profiles, access control, and an inquiry system with status tracking, sorting, and submission.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing feature implementations, related files, components, and test IDs for site-wide mobile prompt and WhatsApp flows.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions using OKLCH variables with light/dark modes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app root with TanStack Router, QueryClient, and global layout wrapped in MobileNumberPromptProvider.
frontend/src/components/site/AgentApplic: Agent application form handling validation, submission, and success/error UI states.
frontend/src/components/site/FloatingCon: Floating action buttons linking to phone and WhatsApp contact helpers.
frontend/src/components/site/InquiryForm: A contact form component that collects inquiry details, validates required fields, submits via a custom hook, and displays success or error messages.
frontend/src/components/site/MobileNumbe: A modal prompting users to enter and validate an Indian mobile number before confirming an action.
A provider that intercepts clicks on interactive elements, opens a mobile-number prompt modal, and executes the original action after confirmation.
The site footer displaying contact info, quick links, and a branded attribution section.
The main site header with navigation links and an optional admin link based on user status.
frontend/src/components/site/VillupuramM: Embeds a Google Maps iframe showing the Villupuram location with a simple layout wrapper.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, updating, creating, and deleting inquiries and agent applications via canister actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAgentApplica: Mutation hook that submits a new agent application and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Mutation hook for submitting a new inquiry with trimmed form fields and refreshing inquiry queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with LIC-themed color variables and utility classes for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/contactLinks.ts: Generates clickable phone and WhatsApp links, including a helper for prefilled inquiry messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutLicPage.tsx: Static informational page describing LIC, its history, offerings, and values with styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/AdminApplicationsPage: Admin interface for viewing, sorting, updating, and deleting agent applications with dialogs and status management.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard, showing loading, access-denied handling, and links to inquiry and agent application management.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInquiriesPage.ts: Displays and manages customer inquiries with sorting, status updates, and deletion via dialogs and API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact details, call/WhatsApp actions, and an inquiry form with location map embedding.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Public landing page featuring hero content, LIC benefits, and navigation to contact and consultation options.
frontend/src/pages/JoinAsAgentPage.tsx: Promotes LIC agent careers with benefits overview and an application form section.
frontend/src/pages/PolicyDetailsPage.tsx: Provides detailed LIC policy information sections with benefits and call-to-action prompts.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: React page rendering a services header and a grid of LIC service cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements for expanding the LIC website, including recruitment features, UI changes, and site-wide interaction rules.
